organizations.name: donald trump announces his supreme court nominee

text:
Donald Trump Announces His Supreme Court Nominee by videos uploaded 
Good news for conservatives... 
On Tuesday, Donald Trump announced he is nominating Judge Neil Gorsuch to the Supreme Court. Prior to the reveal, sources confirmed the news to the Independent Journal Review . 
Related: Direct Phone Numbers Of White House Staff Have Been Leaked 
The 49-year-old attended Harvard Law School with Barack Obama and will be the youngest justice on the current Supreme Court bench.
The Colorado-native is a firm Constitutionalist and has been criticized for making decisions based on religious liberty. According to The Denver Post :
"Gorsuch is best known nationally for taking the side of religious organizations that opposed parts of the Affordable Care Act that compelled coverage of contraceptives." 
To see Donald and Neil's speech, ch-ch-check out the clip (above)!
Not surprisingly, once the announcement was made, Twitter users went online to vent their frustrations! See the best tweets (below)! 
Let the left freaking out begin in 3...2....1 #SCOTUS #NeilGorsuch
